name: Pliksim
description:
Pliksim is a tiny, casual, resource management game. All buildings in Pliksim produce and consume, and to unlock them all you need to find the right mix.

Pliksim has six resources:
  • Wealth
  • Housing
  • Materials
  • Products
  • Ingredients
  • Food

And 20+ buildings that you can choose from.

The goal of the game is to complete all the objectives, an objective can be to build a certain building or to have a given amount of a resource.
